trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>類別用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>方法以提供存取權的商務物件執行個體所使用的任何資料作業之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項和商務物件來執行，但前商務物件被終結。

trans-unit.source: The business object is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用存取商務物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up.
trans-unit.target: 藉由新增委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件，您可以存取的商務物件執行任何的最後一個工作，或清除任何公開的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method is not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>方法不會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，如果執行資料作業的方法是`static`方法。

trans-unit.source: No business object instance is created when the method is static.
trans-unit.target: 靜態方法時，會不建立任何商務物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項不僅會公開許多您可以控制它們來使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯<xref:System.EventArgs>類別和事件處理常式委派。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: EventHandler
trans-unit.target: EventHandler

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前建立的商務物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立商務物件的執行個體之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料之前發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>。

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Insert、 update 或 delete 作業執行之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後擷取的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>。

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 插入、 更新或刪除作業已完成之後發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在商務物件被終結之前發生。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來顯示資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例所使用的範例中介層商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來顯示資訊。

trans-unit.source: You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs.
trans-unit.target: 您可能是耗費 （依據時間或資源） 的 Web 網頁執行每一資料作業建立的商務物件使用。

trans-unit.source: One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一種方式使用高度耗費資源的物件可能要一次，建立它的執行個體，並快取將在後續的作業，而不是建立及終結針對每個資料作業。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範這個模式。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，首先，檢查物件的快取，然後建立執行個體中，只有當其中一個未已快取。

trans-unit.source: Then, handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it.
trans-unit.target: 然後，處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>快取供日後使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs> object is set to `true`, to direct the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to not call the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>物件設定為`true`，以直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>執行個體上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含的基本商務物件，定義`EmployeeLogic`類別，這是一個類別，會維護狀態，並封裝商務邏輯。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯為程式庫，此程式碼，然後再使用這些類別從 ASP 頁面。

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 會與其互動以執行資料作業的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs" /> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控制項用於執行資料作業的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The business object the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> uses to data operations; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if <see langword="null" /> is passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用來進行資料作業的商務物件；如果 <see langword="null" /> 傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the data operation methods (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料作業方法 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) 是指執行個體方法，執行個體的商務物件方法執行之前，先建立。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以防止由儲存物件中的每個呼叫所建立的商務物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: In subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events, you can retrieve the business object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在後續<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，您可以擷取來自商務物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項來顯示資訊。

trans-unit.source: You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs.
trans-unit.target: 您可能是耗費 （依據時間或資源） 的 Web 網頁執行每一資料作業建立的商務物件使用。

trans-unit.source: One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一種方式使用高度耗費資源的物件可能要一次，建立它的執行個體，並快取將在後續的作業，而不是建立及終結針對每個資料作業。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範這個模式。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> event to check the cache for an object first, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，首先，檢查物件的快取，然後建立執行個體中，只有當其中一個未已快取。

trans-unit.source: Then, handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it.
trans-unit.target: 然後，處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>快取供日後使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs> class is set to `true`, to direct the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to not call <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>類別設定為`true`，以直接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不呼叫<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>執行個體上。
